import React, {useState} from 'react' import '../Style/Musicplayer.css' import { FaHeart, FaRegHeart, FaStepBackward,FaBackward, FaPause, FaPlay, FaForward ,FaStepForward, FaShareAlt} from "react-icons/fa" import{ BsDownload} from "react-icons/bs" function MusicPlayer({song,imgsrc}) { const [isLove, setLove] = useState(false); const [isPlaying, setPlaying ]= useState(false); const changePlayPause = () =>{ setPlaying(!isPlaying) } const changeLoved = ()=>{ setLove(!isLove) } return (
) } export { MusicPlayer};
